correlation_analysis.notes: 모든 변수가 p<0.05 수준에서 통계적으로 유의미. ttm_occupancy가 압도적으로 높은 상관(rho=0.955). nearest_poi_dist_km, ttm_pop는 음의 상관(가까울수록, 인구 밀집 지역일수록 RevPAR 낮음 — 도심 저가 숙소 영향 가능성).

superhost_test.interpretation: 수퍼호스트의 RevPAR 중위값(35,469)이 일반 호스트(612)보다 약 58배 높음. 통계적으로 유의미한 차이.

room_type_test.interpretation: 객실 유형에 따른 RevPAR 차이가 통계적으로 유의미. entire_home이 가장 높고 shared_room이 가장 낮음.

operation_status_test.interpretation: 운영 중인 숙소와 비운영 숙소 간 RevPAR 차이가 통계적으로 유의미.

extra_guest_fee_policy_test.interpretation: 추가 게스트 요금 정책이 있는 숙소의 RevPAR 중위값(29,821)이 없는 숙소(6,805)보다 약 4.4배 높음.

python_code:
# =============================================================================
# 서울 에어비앤비 RevPAR 통계 분석
# =============================================================================

# Cell 1: 라이브러리 및 데이터 로드
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.ticker as mticker
import seaborn as sns
from scipy import stats
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

plt.rc('font', family='AppleGothic')
plt.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus'] = False

DATA_PATH = '/Users/jungmo/Documents/data-projects/seoul_airbnb_cleaned_2026-02-18_11-23/data/raw/seoul_airbnb_cleaned.csv'
df = pd.read_csv(DATA_PATH)

# Active+Operating 서브셋
df_ao = df[(df['refined_status'] == 'Active') & (df['operation_status'] == 'Operating')].copy()

print(f'전체 데이터: {df.shape}')
print(f'Active+Operating 서브셋: {df_ao.shape}')

# =============================================================================
# Cell 2: 분포 기본 통계 출력
# =============================================================================
print('=== 전체 ttm_revpar 기본 통계 ===')
print(df['ttm_revpar'].describe().round(2))
print(f'Skewness: {df["ttm_revpar"].skew():.4f}')

print('\n=== Active+Operating ttm_revpar 기본 통계 ===')
print(df_ao['ttm_revpar'].describe().round(2))
print(f'Skewness: {df_ao["ttm_revpar"].skew():.4f}')

# =============================================================================
# Cell 3: ttm_revpar 분포 시각화 (전체 vs Active+Operating)
# =============================================================================
fig, axes = plt.subplots(2, 2, figsize=(14, 8))
fig.suptitle('ttm_revpar 분포 분석', fontsize=14, fontweight='bold')

# (1,1) 전체 분포 — 로그 스케일 히스토그램
ax = axes[0, 0]
valid_all = df[df['ttm_revpar'] > 0]['ttm_revpar']
ax.hist(np.log1p(valid_all), bins=60, color='steelblue', edgecolor='white', alpha=0.8)
ax.set_title('전체 ttm_revpar 분포 (log1p 변환)')
ax.set_xlabel('log1p(ttm_revpar)')
ax.set_ylabel('빈도')
ax.axvline(np.log1p(df['ttm_revpar'].median()), color='red', linestyle='--',
           label=f'중위값: ₩{df["ttm_revpar"].median():,.0f}')
ax.legend(fontsize=9)

# (1,2) Active+Operating 분포
ax = axes[0, 1]
ax.hist(np.log1p(df_ao['ttm_revpar']), bins=60, color='darkorange', edgecolor='white', alpha=0.8)
ax.set_title('Active+Operating ttm_revpar 분포 (log1p 변환)')
ax.set_xlabel('log1p(ttm_revpar)')
ax.set_ylabel('빈도')
ax.axvline(np.log1p(df_ao['ttm_revpar'].median()), color='red', linestyle='--',
           label=f'중위값: ₩{df_ao["ttm_revpar"].median():,.0f}')
ax.legend(fontsize=9)

# (2,1) room_type별 BoxPlot
ax = axes[1, 0]
room_order = df.groupby('room_type')['ttm_revpar'].median().sort_values(ascending=False).index.tolist()
room_data = [df[df['room_type'] == rt]['ttm_revpar'].values for rt in room_order]
bp = ax.boxplot(room_data, labels=room_order, patch_artist=True,
                showfliers=False, medianprops=dict(color='red', linewidth=2))
colors = ['#4c72b0', '#dd8452', '#55a868', '#c44e52']
for patch, color in zip(bp['boxes'], colors):
    patch.set_facecolor(color)
    patch.set_alpha(0.7)
ax.set_title('room_type별 ttm_revpar 분포')
ax.set_ylabel('ttm_revpar (KRW)')
ax.yaxis.set_major_formatter(mticker.FuncFormatter(lambda x, _: f'₩{x:,.0f}'))
ax.tick_params(axis='x', rotation=15)
for i, rt in enumerate(room_order):
    med = df[df['room_type'] == rt]['ttm_revpar'].median()
    ax.annotate(f'₩{med:,.0f}', xy=(i+1, med), xytext=(5, 5),
                textcoords='offset points', fontsize=8, color='red')

# (2,2) operation_status별 KDE
ax = axes[1, 1]
for status, color in [('Operating', 'steelblue'), ('Non_Operating', 'tomato')]:
    sub = df[df['operation_status'] == status]['ttm_revpar']
    valid_sub = np.log1p(sub[sub > 0])
    if len(valid_sub) > 10:
        valid_sub.plot.kde(ax=ax, label=f'{status} (n={len(sub)})', color=color, linewidth=2)
ax.set_title('operation_status별 ttm_revpar 분포 (log1p)')
ax.set_xlabel('log1p(ttm_revpar)')
ax.set_ylabel('밀도')
ax.legend(fontsize=9)

plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('/Users/jungmo/Documents/data-projects/seoul_airbnb_cleaned_2026-02-18_11-23/reports/fig_distribution_analysis.png',
            dpi=150, bbox_inches='tight')
plt.show()

# =============================================================================
# Cell 4: Spearman 상관관계 분석
# =============================================================================
numeric_vars = ['ttm_occupancy', 'ttm_avg_rate', 'num_reviews', 'rating_overall',
                'photos_count', 'nearest_poi_dist_km', 'ttm_pop']

corr_results = []
for col in numeric_vars:
    valid = df[['ttm_revpar', col]].dropna()
    rho, pval = stats.spearmanr(valid['ttm_revpar'], valid[col])
    corr_results.append({'변수': col, 'Spearman rho': round(rho, 4), 'p-value': round(pval, 6),
                         'n': len(valid), '유의미': pval < 0.05})

corr_df = pd.DataFrame(corr_results).sort_values('Spearman rho', key=abs, ascending=False)
print('=== Spearman 상관관계 (ttm_revpar 기준) ===')
print(corr_df.to_string(index=False))

# 상관관계 바 차트
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 5))
colors_bar = ['#2ecc71' if r > 0 else '#e74c3c' for r in corr_df['Spearman rho']]
bars = ax.barh(corr_df['변수'], corr_df['Spearman rho'], color=colors_bar, edgecolor='white', alpha=0.85)
ax.axvline(0, color='black', linewidth=0.8)
for bar, val in zip(bars, corr_df['Spearman rho']):
    offset = 0.01 if val >= 0 else -0.01
    ax.text(val + offset, bar.get_y() + bar.get_height()/2,
            f'{val:.4f}', va='center', ha='left' if val >= 0 else 'right', fontsize=10)
ax.set_xlabel('Spearman rho')
ax.set_title('ttm_revpar와 수치형 변수 간 Spearman 상관계수')
ax.set_xlim(-0.2, 1.05)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('/Users/jungmo/Documents/data-projects/seoul_airbnb_cleaned_2026-02-18_11-23/reports/fig_correlation_analysis.png',
            dpi=150, bbox_inches='tight')
plt.show()

# =============================================================================
# Cell 5: 그룹 간 차이 검정
# =============================================================================
print('=== 그룹 간 통계적 차이 검정 ===\n')

# 1. Superhost Mann-Whitney U
sh_yes = df[df['superhost'] == True]['ttm_revpar'].dropna()
sh_no  = df[df['superhost'] == False]['ttm_revpar'].dropna()
stat, pval = stats.mannwhitneyu(sh_yes, sh_no, alternative='two-sided')
print(f'[Superhost] Mann-Whitney U')
print(f'  statistic={stat:.2f}, p={pval:.4e}')
print(f'  수퍼호스트 중위값: ₩{sh_yes.median():,.0f}  vs  일반 호스트: ₩{sh_no.median():,.0f}')
print(f'  유의미 (p<0.05): {pval < 0.05}\n')

# 2. room_type Kruskal-Wallis
room_groups = [df[df['room_type'] == rt]['ttm_revpar'].dropna() for rt in df['room_type'].unique()]
stat_rt, pval_rt = stats.kruskal(*room_groups)
print(f'[room_type] Kruskal-Wallis')
print(f'  statistic={stat_rt:.2f}, p={pval_rt:.4e}')
print(f'  유의미 (p<0.05): {pval_rt < 0.05}')
for rt in df['room_type'].unique():
    med = df[df['room_type'] == rt]['ttm_revpar'].median()
    print(f'    {rt}: 중위값 ₩{med:,.0f}')
print()

# 3. operation_status Mann-Whitney U
op  = df[df['operation_status'] == 'Operating']['ttm_revpar'].dropna()
nop = df[df['operation_status'] == 'Non_Operating']['ttm_revpar'].dropna()
stat_op, pval_op = stats.mannwhitneyu(op, nop, alternative='two-sided')
print(f'[operation_status] Mann-Whitney U')
print(f'  statistic={stat_op:.2f}, p={pval_op:.4e}')
print(f'  Operating 중위값: ₩{op.median():,.0f}  vs  Non-Operating: ₩{nop.median():,.0f}')
print(f'  유의미 (p<0.05): {pval_op < 0.05}\n')

# 4. extra_guest_fee_policy Mann-Whitney U
eg1 = df[df['extra_guest_fee_policy'] == 1]['ttm_revpar'].dropna()
eg0 = df[df['extra_guest_fee_policy'] == 0]['ttm_revpar'].dropna()
stat_eg, pval_eg = stats.mannwhitneyu(eg1, eg0, alternative='two-sided')
print(f'[extra_guest_fee_policy] Mann-Whitney U')
print(f'  statistic={stat_eg:.2f}, p={pval_eg:.4e}')
print(f'  추가요금 있음(1) 중위값: ₩{eg1.median():,.0f}  vs  없음(0): ₩{eg0.median():,.0f}')
print(f'  유의미 (p<0.05): {pval_eg < 0.05}')

# =============================================================================
# Cell 6: 그룹 비교 시각화
# =============================================================================
fig, axes = plt.subplots(2, 2, figsize=(14, 8))
fig.suptitle('그룹별 ttm_revpar 비교 (Active+Operating 서브셋)', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold')

# Superhost
ax = axes[0, 0]
sh_data_ao = [df_ao[df_ao['superhost'] == True]['ttm_revpar'],
              df_ao[df_ao['superhost'] == False]['ttm_revpar']]
bp = ax.boxplot(sh_data_ao, labels=['수퍼호스트', '일반 호스트'], patch_artist=True,
                showfliers=False, medianprops=dict(color='red', linewidth=2))
bp['boxes'][0].set_facecolor('#f39c12'); bp['boxes'][0].set_alpha(0.7)
bp['boxes'][1].set_facecolor('#3498db'); bp['boxes'][1].set_alpha(0.7)
for i, g in enumerate(sh_data_ao):
    ax.annotate(f'중위값\n₩{g.median():,.0f}', xy=(i+1, g.median()),
                xytext=(20, 10), textcoords='offset points', fontsize=8, color='red',
                arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle='->', color='gray', lw=0.8))
ax.set_title(f'Superhost vs 일반 (p<0.001)')
ax.set_ylabel('ttm_revpar (KRW)')
ax.yaxis.set_major_formatter(mticker.FuncFormatter(lambda x, _: f'₩{x:,.0f}'))

# room_type
ax = axes[0, 1]
room_order_ao = df_ao.groupby('room_type')['ttm_revpar'].median().sort_values(ascending=False).index.tolist()
rt_data_ao = [df_ao[df_ao['room_type'] == rt]['ttm_revpar'].values for rt in room_order_ao]
bp = ax.boxplot(rt_data_ao, labels=room_order_ao, patch_artist=True,
                showfliers=False, medianprops=dict(color='red', linewidth=2))
palet = ['#4c72b0', '#dd8452', '#55a868', '#c44e52']
for patch, color in zip(bp['boxes'], palet):
    patch.set_facecolor(color); patch.set_alpha(0.7)
ax.set_title(f'room_type별 (p<0.001)')
ax.set_ylabel('ttm_revpar (KRW)')
ax.tick_params(axis='x', rotation=15)
ax.yaxis.set_major_formatter(mticker.FuncFormatter(lambda x, _: f'₩{x:,.0f}'))

# operation_status
ax = axes[1, 0]
op_data = [df[df['operation_status'] == s]['ttm_revpar'] for s in ['Operating', 'Non_Operating']]
bp = ax.boxplot(op_data, labels=['Operating', 'Non-Operating'], patch_artist=True,
                showfliers=False, medianprops=dict(color='red', linewidth=2))
bp['boxes'][0].set_facecolor('#27ae60'); bp['boxes'][0].set_alpha(0.7)
bp['boxes'][1].set_facecolor('#e74c3c'); bp['boxes'][1].set_alpha(0.7)
for i, g in enumerate(op_data):
    ax.annotate(f'₩{g.median():,.0f}', xy=(i+1, g.median()),
                xytext=(10, 10), textcoords='offset points', fontsize=9, color='red')
ax.set_title(f'operation_status별 (p<0.001)')
ax.set_ylabel('ttm_revpar (KRW)')
ax.yaxis.set_major_formatter(mticker.FuncFormatter(lambda x, _: f'₩{x:,.0f}'))

# extra_guest_fee_policy
ax = axes[1, 1]
eg_data = [df[df['extra_guest_fee_policy'] == v]['ttm_revpar'] for v in [1, 0]]
bp = ax.boxplot(eg_data, labels=['추가요금 있음(1)', '추가요금 없음(0)'], patch_artist=True,
                showfliers=False, medianprops=dict(color='red', linewidth=2))
bp['boxes'][0].set_facecolor('#8e44ad'); bp['boxes'][0].set_alpha(0.7)
bp['boxes'][1].set_facecolor('#95a5a6'); bp['boxes'][1].set_alpha(0.7)
for i, g in enumerate(eg_data):
    ax.annotate(f'₩{g.median():,.0f}', xy=(i+1, g.median()),
                xytext=(10, 10), textcoords='offset points', fontsize=9, color='red')
ax.set_title(f'extra_guest_fee_policy별 (p<0.001)')
ax.set_ylabel('ttm_revpar (KRW)')
ax.yaxis.set_major_formatter(mticker.FuncFormatter(lambda x, _: f'₩{x:,.0f}'))

plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('/Users/jungmo/Documents/data-projects/seoul_airbnb_cleaned_2026-02-18_11-23/reports/fig_group_tests.png',
            dpi=150, bbox_inches='tight')
plt.show()

# =============================================================================
# Cell 7: 자치구별 RevPAR 통계
# =============================================================================
district_stats = df.groupby('district')['ttm_revpar'].agg(
    median_revpar='median',
    mean_revpar='mean',
    count='count'
).reset_index().sort_values('median_revpar', ascending=False)

print('=== 자치구별 ttm_revpar 통계 (중위값 기준 정렬) ===')
print(district_stats.to_string(index=False))

print(f'\n상위 5구: {district_stats.head()["district"].tolist()}')
print(f'하위 5구: {district_stats.tail()["district"].tolist()}')

# 자치구 RevPAR 바 차트
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(14, 7))
colors_bar = plt.cm.RdYlGn(np.linspace(0.85, 0.15, len(district_stats)))
bars = ax.barh(district_stats['district'], district_stats['median_revpar'],
               color=colors_bar, edgecolor='white', alpha=0.9)
for bar, val in zip(bars, district_stats['median_revpar']):
    ax.text(val + 200, bar.get_y() + bar.get_height()/2,
            f'₩{val:,.0f}', va='center', fontsize=8)
ax.set_xlabel('ttm_revpar 중위값 (KRW)')
ax.set_title('서울 25개 자치구별 ttm_revpar 중위값 순위')
ax.xaxis.set_major_formatter(mticker.FuncFormatter(lambda x, _: f'₩{x:,.0f}'))
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('/Users/jungmo/Documents/data-projects/seoul_airbnb_cleaned_2026-02-18_11-23/reports/fig_district_revpar.png',
            dpi=150, bbox_inches='tight')
plt.show()

# =============================================================================
# Cell 8: 결과 요약 출력
# =============================================================================
print('=' * 60)
print('분석 결과 요약')
print('=' * 60)
print(f'[분포] 전체 ttm_revpar 중위값: ₩{df["ttm_revpar"].median():,.0f}')
print(f'[분포] Active+Operating 중위값: ₩{df_ao["ttm_revpar"].median():,.0f}')
print(f'[상관] ttm_occupancy rho=0.955 — RevPAR의 가장 강력한 예측변수')
print(f'[검정] 수퍼호스트 RevPAR 중위값 {sh_yes.median()/sh_no.median():.0f}배 높음 (p<0.001)')
print(f'[자치구] 최고: Gangdong-gu (중위값 ₩22,211), 최저: Dongjak-gu (중위값 ₩0)')
print('=' * 60)
